content: Share documents for viewing, editing, commenting, or reviewing without registration. You can also embed this room into any web interface.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining that PublicRoomInfo allows sharing documents without registration, and can be embedded in web interfaces. It appears as a HelpButton in a LabelGroup within a ComboBox, providing context for users configuring portal settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reviewing' (مراجعة) is a bit too formal and doesn't quite capture the full nuance of 'reviewing' in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'إعادة النظر' (i'adah an-nazar) or 'الاطلاع عليها' (al-iitlaa' 'alayha).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'مراجعة' with 'إعادة النظر' or 'الاطلاع عليها'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "place this room" (yerləşdirə bilərsiniz) is not the most natural way to express embedding a room into a web interface. A better translation would convey the idea of integrating or embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Həmçinin bu otağı istənilən veb interfeysə inteqrasiya edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a severe issue, the sentence structure could be improved for smoother reading. Separating the first and second sentences could enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qeydiyyatdan keçmədən sənədlərə baxmaq, redaktə etmək, şərh etmək və ya nəzərdən keçirmək üçün paylaşın. Həmçinin, bu otağı istənilən veb interfeysə inteqrasiya edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kontrolování' (controlling/checking) doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'reviewing' in this context. It's a bit too formal and suggests a verification process rather than a general review.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sdílejte dokumenty k prohlížení, úpravám, komentování nebo prozkoumávání bez registrace.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Geben Sie Dokumente frei" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Share documents'. A better translation would focus on the act of sharing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Teilen Sie Dokumente...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Weboberfläche" is correct for 'web interface', it sounds slightly formal. Depending on the target audience, a more common term might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Webseite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "web interface" is a bit literal. A more natural Greek translation would be something along the lines of "ιστότοπο" or "εφαρμογή ιστού".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μπορείτε επίσης να ενσωματώσετε αυτό το δωμάτιο σε οποιονδήποτε ιστότοπο ή εφαρμογή ιστού.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'incrustar' (embed) can sound a bit technical or unusual in this context. A more natural phrasing might be 'integrar' or 'insertar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Comparta documentos para su visualización, edición, comentario o revisión sin necesidad de registrarse. También puede integrar esta sala en cualquier interfaz web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'katseltavaksi' is repeated unnecessarily. The English 'reviewing' isn't adequately represented and the repetition makes the sentence awkward in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jaa asiakirjoja katseltavaksi, muokattavaksi, kommentoitavaksi tai tarkasteltavaksi ilman rekisteröintiä. Voit myös upottaa tämän huoneen mihin tahansa verkkokäyttöliittymään.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Share documents" is too literal. A more natural Armenian phrasing for sharing would be something like "Համերձեք փաստաթղթերը" or "Տարածեք փաստաթղթերը".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Համերձեք փաստաթղթերը դիտելու, խմբագրելու, մեկնաբանելու կամ վերանայելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'web interface' is translated literally. 'վեբ ինտերֆեյս' is technically correct, but it might be more understandable for a broader audience if rendered as something closer to 'ցանցի միջավայր' or 'էլեկտրոնային հարթակ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղադրել այս սենյակը ցանկացած ցանցի միջավայրի մեջ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Share documents" is too literal. A more natural Japanese phrasing would be 'ドキュメントを共有' (dokyumento o kyōyū) or 'ドキュメントの共有' (dokyumento no kyōyū). The current translation, while technically correct, sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ドキュメントの共有が可能

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'any' in "any web interface" is overly broad. It is slightly unnatural in Japanese. A more appropriate phrasing would be more specific to the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 任意のウェブインターフェース (onoo webu intāfēsu) is acceptable, but consider rephrasing for greater clarity depending on the target audience.  For example, '任意のウェブサイトに埋め込むこともできます' (you can also embed it into any website).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "인베드할 수도 있습니다" is an incorrect transliteration of "embed." The correct Korean word for embed in this context is '임베드하다' or a more natural phrasing using '삽입하다'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 등록하지 않고도 문서를 확인하고 편집하고 주석을 달거나 검토할 수 있도록 공유하세요. 또한 웹 인터페이스에 이 룸을 임베드할 수도 있습니다. or 등록하지 않고도 문서를 확인하고 편집하고 주석을 달거나 검토할 수 있도록 공유하세요. 또한 웹 인터페이스에 이 룸을 삽입할 수도 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຝັງຫ້ອງນີ້ເຂົ້າ​ໃນ​ສ່ວນຕິດຕໍ່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ເວັບໃດໆ​ໄດ້" is a bit clunky. A more natural translation for "embed this room into any web interface" might be "ສາມາດນໍາຫ້ອງນີ້ໄປໃສ່ເວັບໄຊ້ໄດ້ເຕັມສ່ວນ" or something similar. The current translation sounds somewhat literal and less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສາ​ມາດນໍາຫ້ອງນີ້ໄປໃສ່ເວັບໄຊ້ໄດ້ເຕັມສ່ວນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'review' is translated as 'beoordelen'. While technically correct, 'review' in this context refers more to a formal assessment or evaluation. 'Beoordelen' can imply a grading or scoring which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'bekijken en evalueren' or 'bekijken en beoordelen' if a more general term is acceptable. Alternatively, 'recenseren' could also work but it has a slightly different connotation, implying a more expert review.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Share" is "Partilhe". While technically correct, it's a more formal form. A more natural translation for a user-facing interface might be "Compartilhe".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Compartilhe documentos para visualizar, editar, comentar ou rever sem registo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Você' is slightly unusual in a formal/technical context. While not incorrect, 'Pode' or 'Você pode' would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pode também incorporar esta sala em qualquer interface web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'editing' is missing from the Romanian translation. The English text explicitly mentions 'editing'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Partajați documente pentru vizualizarea, editarea, comentarea sau revizuirea fără înregistrare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'room' is translated as 'sală', which can be confusing. While 'sală' can mean room, in this context it could be misinterpreted as a physical room. A more appropriate translation might be 'spațiu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Partajați documente pentru vizualizarea, editarea, comentarea sau revizuirea fără înregistrare. De asemenea puteți incorpora acest spațiu în orice interfață web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a typo. The word 'această' should be 'acest'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Partajați documente pentru vizualizarea, editarea, comentarea sau revizuirea fără înregistrare. De asemenea puteți incorpora acest spațiu în orice interfață web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Share documents' is translated as 'ලේඛන බලන්න', which literally means 'view documents'. While viewing is a valid action, 'share' implies distribution. A more accurate translation would convey the act of sharing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේඛන බෙදා ගන්න (Lekhana beda gana)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reviewing' is translated as 'සමාලෝචනය කරන්න'. While technically correct, it can be perceived as formal or too specific depending on the context. A more general term for 'review' could be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමාලෝචනය කිරීම් කරන්න (Samalochana kirim karna) or පරීක්ෂා කිරීම් කරන්න (Pariksha kirim karna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'embed this room' is translated as 'මෙම කාමරය ඇතුළු කිරීමට හැකිය'. 'ඇතුළු කිරීමට' is more like 'to include', it does not mean 'embed'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරය ඇතුළත් කිරීමට හැකිය (This room can be incorporated).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Share documents' is 'Delite dokumente'. While 'deliti' means 'to share', 'Delite' is a formal imperative form. A more natural and common way to say 'Share documents' in Slovenian would be 'Delite dokumente'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Delite dokumente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'web interface' is translated as 'spletni vmesnik'. A more natural and widely understood translation would be 'spletni interfejs'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: spletni interfejs

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reviewing' is translated as 'прегледање' which literally means 'browsing' or 'looking over'. 'Прегледање' doesn't quite capture the nuance of a formal review process. A better translation would be 'исправљање' (correcting) or 'давање повратних информација' (providing feedback).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Делите документе за преглед, уређивање, коментарисање или исправљање/давање повратних информација без регистрације.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is a bit long and could be improved for readability. Breaking it into two shorter sentences might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Делите документе за преглед, уређивање, коментарисање или исправљање без регистрације. Такође можете уградити ову собу у било који веб интерфејс.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reviewing' is translated as 'pregledanje'. While technically correct, 'recenziranje' would be a more appropriate translation in this context, implying a more formal review process, aligning with the implication of professional collaboration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Delite dokumente za pregled, uređivanje, komentarisanje ili recenziranje bez registracije.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “embed” is translated as “ugraditi”. While understandable, 'uvesti' might be a more suitable and common term for embedding a room into a web interface. 'Ugraditi' often implies physical installation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Delite dokumente za pregled, uređivanje, komentarisanje ili recenziranje bez registracije. Takođe možete uvesti ovu sobu u bilo koji veb interfejs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Share documents' is slightly awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Belgeleri paylaşın' or 'Dosyaları paylaşın'. While 'belgeleri' is technically correct, 'dosyaları' is more commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dosyaları paylaşın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'gömebilirsin' (you can embed) is grammatically correct, a more formal and professional tone is expected in this context. A more formal version would be 'gömülebilirsiniz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: gömülebilirsiniz
